groups.description: Stack, Memory, Storage and Flow Operations

opcodes.description: Get address of currently executing account
Get balance of the given account
Get deposited value by the instruction/transaction responsible for this execution
Get input data of current environment
Get size of input data in current environment
Copy input data in current environment to memory

Copy code running in current environment to memory
Get price of gas in current environment
Get external code size (from another contract)
Get size of return data buffer
Copy return data in current environment to memory
Get hash of most recent complete block
Get the size of active memory
Get the amount of available gas

opcodes.gas_formula: Complex -- see yellow paper  Appendix H

opcodes.description: Message-call with another account's code only
opcodes.gas_formula: Complex -- see yellow paper  Appendix H

opcodes.description: Like CALLCODE but keeps caller's value and sender
opcodes.gas_formula: Complex -- see yellow paper  Appendix H

opcodes.description: Like CALL but disallow state modifications
Create new account with associated code at address `sha3(sender + salt + sha3(init code)) % 2**160`
Halt execution, revert state and return output data
Invalid instruction for expressing runtime errors (e.g., division-by-zero)
Halt execution and register account for later deletion
